column1: ConditionsThe permittee shall comply with all existing trafficcontrols and parking restrictions. The permittee shallalso comply with any additional restrictions under theSpecial Traffic Permit issued by SFMTA. Forinformation related to construction traffic restrictionsplease reference the latest edition of Regulations forWorking in San Francisco Streets, the Blue Book. Todownload a copy of the Blue Book, please visithttps://www.sfmta.com/services/streets-sidewalks/construction-regulations.A minimum four (4) foot wide clear pedestrian walkwaymust be maintained at all times.Event/Operation:Fiber SplicingPermit Linear Footage20Elements of OccupancyBucket truck, splicing trailerFrom:12/1/2017 08:00AMStart Time08:00AMTo:12/1/2017 05:00 PMEnd Time05:00 PMNeed to call for InspectionNeed to post tow-away signTo activate and register this permit for towing, followthe tow-away sign activation and photo uploadprocess.
